job.script:
#!/bin/bash
FILES=`ls -1t /var/sfj/upload/*.xlsx 2> /dev/null | tail -1`
if [ "${FILES}" != "" ] then echo "Fouond File Name : ${FILES}"
FILE=`echo ${FILES} | tail -1`
if [ "${FILE}" != "" ] then FILE=`basename ${FILE}` echo "FileName : ${FILE}"
POST=`sed "s/SFJFILENAME/${FILE}/g" /etc/sfj/soap.xml | sed "s/SFJJOB/sfj_make_paramater/g"| sed "s/SFJPARA/FILENAME/g"` echo "POST : ${POST}" echo ${POST} | curl "http://192.168.100.242:4444/scheduler" -X POST -d @-
echo "FILENAME=$FILE" >> $SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES exit 11 fi fi
exit 0 #
